title: WOOOOO! Man you gotta love the report system! HAHA
body:

This guy and his friends just go around ruining the game for people, and if anyone tries to fix it, BAM reported. here ill let you looks at what was just so report worthy, and go ahead and tell me what you think.

replies.body: Also id like to mention, kai went 2/9 and literally would stand and run down lanes, with fiddle.

okay....let's assume that they did because I'm too lazy to go dig for the truth. How does that fact justified your chat log?  You tried to fix how? By flaming and harassing and threatening them?  How does that fix things and not make the situation worse for 2 other people?  And instead of just dealing with 2 supposedly inters, now they have a 3rd flamer feeding the trolls.

In what situation does flaming fix anything?

Are you guys serious? i was stuck in that game for a hour, and you dont even get to see THIER chat logs! Dont sit there and give me a hoiler than thou response when you dont know how frustratiing it was for my WHOLE TEAM for this one person to literally feed all lanes, and be so passive agressive. as you can see at the start of my logs, i was helpful! i was nice, but league is a breeding ground for toxicity, and i dont think its fair that only i was punished for people ruining the game!

You aren't stuck. Nobody forced you to queue up for a game. You decided to.

You were not punished for them ruining the game. You were punished because you ruined the game.
im punished because i responed to people runing the game? in what world, does that make sense?
youre right, i didnt que up for a game where someone would force me to be a jerk. thats correct! wow! but at the same time, what was  isuppsoed to do? leave the game? make it even worse for my team?

No. You mute them, report them at the end of the game, and move on - like a mature adult.

You don't get to break the rules just because you're unhappy with someone. You're expected to have self control and not make a bad situation worse by flaming, arguing, or insulting others.

The rules actually make this clear - there is no difference in the rules just because others broke them first.
But im still the only one who got punished even thought you just said they broke them first. im fine with my punishment, i just dont see why no one else gets on as well?

Good that you made peace with your punishment.

Whether someone got punished or not depends on their account toxicity history.  No one ever get chat restricted off of one game.  You didn't.  You may be shown 1 to 5 chat logs as SAMPLE(S) of your toxicity, but they are certainly not the only games you were toxic in.  The only time someone would get punished off of one game is from escalation due to zero tolerance, game play offenses, or perma-bannable offenses like cheating, doxxing, etc.  NOT chat restriction.  You could not possibly know if they already have an account pattern of toxic behavior or that was the one off game where they were toxic in.  Whether that game should pushed their account toxicity history into punishment territory or not is not something you can have any knowledge of.

Also, you do not always get notification even if your report got someone punished.  So no notification does not mean they didn't get punished.  There's also the fact that it is impossible to stalk someone's account to see if they got chat restricted or not.  CR didn't prevent you from continue to play...

If you reported them, their accounts would have been investigated.

There are only two situations where an account is punished off of one game: either the account has a history of toxicity or prior punishments and thus is on "thinner ice", or the toxicity is **so** severe to not need more games. Even if other games were not displayed in the client reform card, that does not mean they don't exist.
Because replying to the one asshole who is ruining the game **derails the game further for everyone else who is not ruining the game.** Why are you not understanding this? IGNORE ASSHOLES.
OR! MAYBE I COULDVE TALKED LIKE A ROBOT! BECUASE THATS HOW RITO LIKES TO FIX THEIR PROBLEMS! SEND A ROBOT TO ISSUE REPORTS! WHOOOOO THAT MAKES SENSE!

Ya, we can see that mentioned in your logs. 

Not every lane is supposed to be an automatic win, especially against an aggressive and snowballing lane like a Pyke-Leona bot lane. There wasn't any constructive criticism. You just berated your teammates for not doing well, calling them intentional feeders, trash, and calling for reports, and this: 

>XShrekTheLover: i dont wanna get my hands dirty. this trash probs has many stds

Simply doesn't belong in league. Keep in mind also that calling for reports is unnecessary and did contribute to your punishment; it only takes 1 report to trigger a review of one's logs.

Most of your logs are negative, but if you need additional help in pointing out what's negative I'd be happy to help.

As for your vote: No, it doesn't suck to be you and Riot's not going to fix something ~~that isn't broken.~~

Edit: That isn't working as you'd like. Certainly can always use a tune-up. 
You'd responded after this edit.

once again, you only see MY log. and since you werent there, you cant see how the other person responded. i was stuck, locked into a game with a toxic jerk, and IM THE ONE WHO IS PUNISHED? these guys are literally going around ruining peoples game and experiances!! but yet im teh one who has to reflect on a moment of utter rage induced by some guy and his friends getting a kick out of people getitng reported!

>once again

huh?

I know it sucks when you're playing with chumps/chumpettes. I get that. That still doesn't give you the right to flame or start being toxic; that worsens the game experience for everyone, regardless of the behavior of others. And it didn't change anything in the game for the better, otherwise you'd have stopped at some point.

The Devs themselfs admit that league can get pretty heated, and if youre stuck in teh same game with someone just berating you, it kinda becomes a red blur, and its not entirely fair, that im the one who is punished for people going around and just doing this type of thing on a daily basis! like come on, if i could show you THEIR chat log, maybe youd be able to see things a bit better

> if i could show you THEIR chat log, maybe youd be able to see things a bit better

I think that might help answer *why* you said what you said, but that doesn't really answer whether your behavior should be permissible in League. 

Toxic players make clear in their chat that they're either willing to work with the rest of their team or they're gonna continue being negative. If your teammates reach that point in the game, then it's best to just mute and report them in the post game.

I love how people default to "mute and report" as if we humans don't have emotion. We all can't be emotionless robots like "Punishment" bot that just looks for key phrases and not what actually goes in the game.

I never told you or anyone to behave like an emotionless robot. 

So please, stop repeating that like some sort of robot.

Can you read before replying and disregarding other peoples feelings? That kind of practice is terrible customer support. Saying "Mute and report" just makes it look like your saying "your feelings are invalid just report" as if the OP has no right to express how they feel. Saying "Just Mute and Report" makes you sound like a robot.

Sorry, your "freedom of expression" stops when it tramples on other people's freedom to enjoy the game ESPECIALLY when there are defined rules in place that you had to agree to before you can play that very specifically said you cannot do that.  You are more than welcome to express your feelings, just not in insulting, harassing, threatening ways (as per the rules you agreed to).  You can speak your mind, just be at the very least neutral about it.

Now before you come back with the other supposedly inters and trolls (by the way, you do not have the authority to make the call whether or not they are inters or trolls, only Rito is authorized to do that) trampled on your freedom to enjoy the game, that's what the "report" part is for.  Just like when you trampled on theirs, they reported you.
How was any of this relevant to my comment?
> Saying "Mute and report" just makes it look like your saying "your feelings are invalid just report" **as if the OP has no right to express how they feel.**

Mute and report is probably the most concise and helpful thing I can tell someone to avoid punishment. It might come off as robotic, but if you have other suggestions for them to avoid the next punishment, then please, tell them. I don't know why you're upset with what I'm telling them, but their logs displayed an obvious reason for a punishment.  Riot's current system punishes players for their behaviors and actions, not for those of other players. I'm not going to waste time discussing what someone else does in a game; it detracts from the fact that the OP had infractions and should look to curb that from his logs. I empathize with having negative players in the game. I've definitely had my share. 

Every player is held responsible for their actions, including this OP as well as you.

>once again

What do you mean? Are you in a different thread commenting about your 2 week suspension?

its a chat restriction, and its not fair that im the only one who was punished, i dont see how you guys can just ignore the fact that people flamed ME first! its like you dont see it from my perspective! ive been going back and forth to dozens of people including riot support to try and tell them that there ARE PEOPLE GOING AROUND AND INTINTIONALLY ABUSING THE REPORT SYSTEM!!! are you jsut ignoring that? do you not understand? what more needs to be said?? its not fair!!

That they flame you first doesnt  mean you can flame back period! Its still against the rules.

Its not about perspective its about following the rules. Its simple if break the rules you get punisht there is no context or excuse to flame sombody its against the rules.

OK, so how far into the game was the person "running it down?" Because you started flaming your team early on, as soon as your ganks apparently didn't produce the results you desired.

i didnt talk for most of the game, i just sat there as the kai berated me for not ganking. there isnt any timestamps here so i can forgive you for making that assumption. i didnt gank bot becuase top and mid needed more help becuase they had counters.

What helps me to get past being frustrated at assholes is to focus on the people who are **not** being assholes. Very rarely is it the entire team, and I don't want to start a flame war that the rest of the people in the game have to deal with. It's not fair to them.

That is still not adressing the problem. there are people GOING AROUND ruining games like this for people. constantly! and its not fair that i get restricted while they get to go and laugh and people getting banned.
The best you can do is choose to **not** be part of the problem. Don't engage with them.
Edit: i COULDENT gank bot yet, is what im saying. had i not been across the map and had teleport instead of smite, i couldve at least tried.

You accused people of inting (harassment), told people to "stfu," repeatedly called them "trash," accused them of ruining the game, repeatedly screamed at them in caps, and repeatedly announced that you were reporting them. You spent your entire time in chat raging and flaming. This was a correct punishment.
